name: Name
epochDetail: Epoch for which these values are valid
initialDetail: The initial inflation percentage from time 0
taperDetail: Rate per year at which inflation is lowered. Rate reduction is derived using the target slot time in genesis config
foundationDetail: Percentage of total inflation allocated to the foundation
foundationTermDetail: Duration of foundation pool inflation in years
slotsPerEpochDetail: The maximum number of slots in each epoch
leaderScheduleSlotOffsetDetail: Rate per year at which inflation is lowered. Rate reduction is derived using the target slot time in genesis config
warmupDetail: Whether epochs start short and grow
